languages.text: "В нашей команде есть слуга Лекс Империалис, да не один, а с внушительным псом! Хотя, даже взгляда проктора хватило бы, чтобы очередь расступилась".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "У нас в команде есть превосходная ищейка — и мы не спешим воспользоваться ее талантами! А ведь оскал кибермастифа любого заставит отдать билет..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Though the Proctor could probably just stare at the queue, and it would move right aside."
languages.original_text: "В нашей команде есть слуга Лекс Империалис, да не один, а с внушительным псом! Хотя, даже взгляда проктора хватило бы, чтобы очередь расступилась".

traits.locale_text: "We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Although the Proctor could just stare at the queue to make it move aside."
"We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Although the Proctor could just stare at the queue to make it move aside."
"We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Though the Proctor could probably just stare at the queue, and it would move right aside."

"We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Though the Proctor could probably just stare at the queue, and it would move right aside."
"We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Though the Proctor could probably just stare at the queue, and it would move right aside."

languages.text: "Wir haben einen Diener des Lex Imperia in unserem Team, und er hat einen echt beeindruckenden Hund! Aber vermutlich müsste der Proktor die Schlange nur schief ansehen, und sie würde zur Seite weichen."
languages.original_text: "We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Though the Proctor could probably just stare at the queue, and it would move right aside."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben einen Diener des Lex Imperia in unserem Team, und er hat einen echt beeindruckenden Hund! Aber vermutlich müsste der Proktor die Schlange nur schief ansehen, und sie würde zur Seite weichen."

languages.text: « Nous avons un serviteur de la Lex Imperialis dans notre camp, accompagné d'un molosse redoutable ! Enfin, je crois qu'il suffirait au proctor de toiser du regard les gens de la file d'attente pour qu'ils nous laissent passer bien gentiment. »
languages.original_text: "We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Though the Proctor could probably just stare at the queue, and it would move right aside."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons un serviteur de la Lex Imperialis dans notre camp, accompagné d'un molosse redoutable ! Enfin, je crois qu'il suffirait au proctor de toiser du regard les gens de la file d'attente pour qu'ils nous laissent passer bien gentiment. »

languages.text: “我们身边有位法务部的官员，还有一条非常吓人的狗！说不定，只要让咱们这位监察官盯着队伍里的人，那些人就会赶紧让开。”
languages.original_text: "We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Though the Proctor could probably just stare at the queue, and it would move right aside."

traits.locale_text: “我们身边有位法务部的官员，还有一条非常吓人的狗！说不定，只要让咱们这位监察官盯着队伍里的人，那些人就会赶紧让开。”

languages.text: «Tenemos a un sirviente de la Lex Imperialis en nuestro equipo, ¡y con un perro formidable, además! Aunque el Procurador podría limitarse a mirar fijamente a la cola y nos abrirían paso de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Though the Proctor could probably just stare at the queue, and it would move right aside."

traits.locale_text: «Tenemos a un sirviente de la Lex Imperialis en nuestro equipo, ¡y con un perro formidable, además! Aunque el Procurador podría limitarse a mirar fijamente a la cola y nos abrirían paso de inmediato».

languages.text: 「アタシたちのチームにはレックス・インペリアの奉仕者がいるし、強力な犬だっている！とはいえ、代理人さんが列をじっと見つめるだけで、列はすぐに脇にどいて道をあけるだろうけどね」
languages.original_text: "We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Though the Proctor could probably just stare at the queue, and it would move right aside."

traits.locale_text: 「アタシたちのチームにはレックス・インペリアの奉仕者がいるし、強力な犬だっている！とはいえ、代理人さんが列をじっと見つめるだけで、列はすぐに脇にどいて道をあけるだろうけどね」

languages.text: "Şimdi saflarımıza Lex İmperialis'in bir hizmetkârı dâhil oldu, üstelik yanında müthiş bir it de getirmiş! Amma velakin Üsteğmen, sıradakilere tek bir haşin bakış fırlatsa kalabalık derhâl yarılıp yol verir."
languages.original_text: "We've got a servant of the Lex Imperialis on our team, and with a formidable dog to boot! Though the Proctor could probably just stare at the queue, and it would move right aside."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi saflarımıza Lex İmperialis'in bir hizmetkârı dâhil oldu, üstelik yanında müthiş bir it de getirmiş! Amma velakin Üsteğmen, sıradakilere tek bir haşin bakış fırlatsa kalabalık derhâl yarılır, yol verir."
